Posts.Content: I know it's hard.  You just have to try to be positive.  I have no children or husband and very little family support, although my father has just woken up to what is going on, he did the 'ostrich syndrome' If i don't know about it I don't have to deal with it! I know what you mean about the mastectomy situation,  it's been on my mind also.  After 5 years of battling, I am fed up, big time! Sharon
Posts.Title: 2 WLE and waiting for results.
